website_summaries.verdict: This model is battery operated, making it as portable and convenient as a traditional punch, but better.
pros: Punches are movable to meet your spacing needs
Handles a lot of paper at once
Great if you have to take your hole punching project on the road
Includes an AC adapter if you want to plug it in
cons: Emptying the holes on this model can be a little challenging

customer_reviews.title: Pushing down kind of defeats the purpose
customer_reviews.text: Arrived earlier than expected and no product damage. Nice addition to my office decor. Seems to be well-constructed. Works nicely but when I ordered this, I didn't think I had to push down on anything. Thought I could just slide the paper in and the hole punch would work automatically. I've seen some newly constructed manual hole punchers where they require less pushing effort than the old-fashioned kind but I got an electric hole puncher so I wouldn't have to push down at all. That said, having an electric hole punch where I have to push down seems to defeat the purpose to me. Perhaps I did not read the description well enough before I ordered this particular model...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jamming Hole Puncher
customer_reviews.text: This hole puncher jams with every punch. When I look at it and press the punch button, I can see that one of the punchers does not return to its' upward position so I can pull my paper out!!!. As a result I end up having to wiggle, wrangle, and pull the paper out with force, often tearing the hole! This is the second time I have purchased this puncher. The first one worked fine but conked out eventually but I liked and considered how long it did last and decided to get the same type. Bad decision. I think this hole puncher is defective!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: Dead in less than 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked nice for a while. Dead in less than 6 months. One of the punch can't puncture more than several pages. Contacted the manufacturer for warranty. Amazon said 1 year warranty so does the manufacturer website. Never got reply. Stay away from this product. I should have bought the more expensive ones. Warranty? Don't expect this particular brand to honor.
customer_reviews.author: Jiayu Zhang

customer_reviews.title: not worth the money - I must have gotten a lemon
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product new and used it only twice before it started acting up, One of the metal pegs that actually make the cut in the paper got stuck in the down position and now will not raise when the other two do thus when it making holes in a paper only two pegs do so. If the third one happens to raise the paper will get caught in it and you have to tear the paper up getting if out of the machine. I am throwing it away. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: joyce arand

customer_reviews.title: This is Not the Hole Punch You’re Looking For
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the usually dependable Swingline name. Sadly, it’s just another piece of cheap Chinese-manufactured junk. Jams every other use. Flimsy construction. I definitely do not recommend. I would have returned it but it took the skills of a surgeon to open the molded plastic container. Actually, surgeon isn’t accurate. More like lumberjack with chain saw. In any case, the container was so badly mangled it made the return (probably) impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Kempfer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this thing at first. Bought it about 90days ago and only used it half a dozen times or so ang guess what... Its Broken Already! I push the button and all i get is a clicking sound. And no theres nothing stuck in it, its not jammed or anything. Uugghh! So dag on disappointed 😤😟
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! as others have said don't overload it. Its pretty obvious when youre trying to overload it because the papers don't slide in smoothly. If you try to force them it will jam. If used properly it works well makes clear holes and they are always lined up. It definitely beats any manual hole puncher ive ever used. I love the fact that it can work on batteries as well as being plugged in so I have flexibility in where I use it. I just wish the capacity were a little larger
customer_reviews.author: CSS

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Gets a workout in my classroom and no issues.
customer_reviews.text: Soooo much easier and better than a manual hole punch. My students use it and because it is electric they don't mash it like they would a manual hole punch. A light press on the front top of the hole punch and wow!. Only downside might be that there are no guides for exact punches on multiple sets of papers. Doesn't bother me and I've worked that out. Wish I had purchased one sooner. By the way, I have one for home and one for my classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Very Loud and Not Adjustable
customer_reviews.text: My manual one jammed so much and finally stopped working one day. I bought this one as a replacement. It is so loud when I press the button and I think people can hear the sound (kind of like a vending machining dispensing the goods) outside of my small office. Also, there is no indicator, like my old manual one, to show the alignment. I made a few bad punches because I wasn't able to tell if the papers have been pushed in far enough.
customer_reviews.author: christallef

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ... except it's louder than I anticipated.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this 5 stars, but it's a bit louder than I would prefer. It's decidedly not "whisper quiet". On the other hand, it does an amazing job. It makes very quick work for all my hole punching needs. Because I was able to put a larger amount of paper into it, I was able to hole punch a 400 page document with ease and it only took a few minutes to accomplish. The choice of using a cord or batteries is an absolute plus. I love it so much I donated my manual hole punch!
customer_reviews.author: KellyAnn

customer_reviews.title: got an even worse review, so I am stuck with buying bad ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this August 15, 2015 and have used it only 4 months for personal use. It can no longer punch one of the holes!! And Amazon Prime warranty police is 30 days, so if I choose to, I'll have to spend another $36. Bostitch, the only other option, got an even worse review, so I am stuck with buying bad or worse. Swingline always had a good reputation. I think it is a travesty to have an item for just personal use die in 4 months. Shame on Swingline
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Surprising Product
customer_reviews.text: I checked several local stores for an electric 3 hole punch. I was shocked at the high prices. I bought this one through Amazon and was a little dubious because of the low price .... you know the whole "you get what you pay for". Well this is an excellent product. I use it regularly to put some class folders together and it works great. Its fast and easy. I had shoulder surgery and wasn't able to press down on a manual one, so this one does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: KCEE

customer_reviews.title: I love that it is electrical & do not have to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a "godsend"!! It is a thing of beauty! I so appreciate this simple product that does what it says it does; it cut my work time in half. Made my life so much easier!! I love that it is electrical & do not have to bother with batteries. (It does have an option for batteries, should the need arise.) I would highly recommend this 3 hole punch.
customer_reviews.author: FloridaResident

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hole punch for use in my classroom. After 2 months of light use, I noticed it was not completely cutting the hole all around, and then a week or so later, it just completely stopped working. Tried to contact the manufacturer and was not helped. What a waste of money. Trashed it!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: ... really well - only thing that would make it better is if it would do more pages at one ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for a while but then the bottom hole stopped punching through : ( I have this in my classroom but it doesn't get used as much as my other hole punch - I think because the kids know it doesn't hole punch properly - I've tried emptying the hole punches often so that they weren't impeding the functioning of the hole punch but still won't go all the way through - such a bummer as I bought this with my own money - wish it had an adjustment or something but unfortunately no : (
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Consistent
customer_reviews.text: This 3-hole punch works great. The paper fits well and the holes are very consistent. It will do 15 pages but not any more. It felt a little flimsy when I opened it but has performed great.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: Time saver and kid friendly
customer_reviews.text: This has been a life saver in my classroom! Super easy to use and totally kid friendly. I allow my students to use this in my elementary classroom and they have no problems using it! Batteries don’t last too long so I’d recommend keeping it plugged in for best usage.
customer_reviews.author: Julie N

customer_reviews.title: perfect for small office
customer_reviews.text: perfect for a small but busy office; easy to use; no issues after using hundreds maybe thousands of times by different peeps in our office.......NO complaints :)
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: This now sits in my garbage can, where it belongs
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been nothing but a pain to use, so typically I have avoided doing so. It constantly jams, doesn't actually cut a hole, holds onto paper of varying sizes and won't let go (even when you use the reverse button). It won't even punch a hole in one piece of paper. This now sits in my garbage can, where it belongs, and I am forced to buy another one. SAVE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: A. Cole

customer_reviews.title: 2-hole puncher
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hole puncher on July 6, 2018 for personal use. I must have used it fewer than 50 times since then, and now it can only punch 2 holes. Very frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: amazon's fan

customer_reviews.title: Purchased 8/19, broken by 3/20 - not a good value
customer_reviews.text: The stapler portion quit working after just a few months. We thought we were saving over purchasing a different brand for more money and ended up losing $150. No wonder the return policy was only 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Marlina Robins

customer_reviews.title: At last--relief for my pummeled hands!
customer_reviews.text: This hole punch is so smooth and easy. It punches the holes cleanly without having to stand on it to make it work--or leaving me looking for a sling after punching a few holes. The paper guide is well designed as well. It guides your papers into a tidy little corner so all the separate punches are consistent with each other. Swingline is a company of integrity and they are quick to make sure the customer is satisfied. I've dealt with their products for years, and the couple of items that failed us were soon replaced by equal or better items.
customer_reviews.author: CaroChel

customer_reviews.title: Needs more features for this price point
customer_reviews.text: Too slow, no paper support. Button was hard to work. I liked the idea of large number of pages punched but other lack of features turned us off.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Gathright

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my office and it stopped punching 3 holes after about a few times using it. Tried to contact seller and no luck!
customer_reviews.author: Marci Q

customer_reviews.title: Worked for only a month :(
customer_reviews.text: Today is March 18, 2017. I received this hole puncher on April first. I was excited that my hand will no longer hurt from punching holes by hand (I'm a teacher) today only one side of this thing will punch a hole through a single piece of paper.
customer_reviews.author: Lajoni Austin

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: This product sucks. 1 of the 3 hole punches doesn't go through paper after just 3 uses. I had it sitting in my classroom unable to use it again and I just realized that I just pasted the 1 yr warranty even though I only used this 3 times. Don't waste your money!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Darnell

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I've purchase for our office. The last one we bought 2 years ago and it's still going strong. We put together a lot of thick meeting binders and you can only use a regular hole punch for so long before it starts to hurt your hand. I even had one employee who used to stand on the whole punch level after awhile because she had so many to do. This is a much better solution. Gives consistant holes quickly. I would purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: C. Curtiss

customer_reviews.title: I REALLY like this one
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find a multi-page punch that actually works! I REALLY like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jcoffee

customer_reviews.title: Teacher loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my spouse who is an English teacher. I wanted him to he able to do punch a whole class of essays in one or two stacks. I also wanted it to be portable so he didn't have to step over cords around his desk and he could lock it in his drawer at the end of the day. He loves it. Works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Chartchecker

customer_reviews.title: should have returned it
customer_reviews.text: it does not punch more than 5 pages and it is so slow i just went back to my manual stapler. very time consuming
customer_reviews.author: Hilda L. Spears

customer_reviews.title: Great for the office!
customer_reviews.text: Works really well, but I find we have to change out the cut holes pretty often (because we use it too much!!). So far I haven't had any problems and it works like a power machine. It was a little expensive but if you can find it on sale, it's definitely worth the purchase, especially for a small office. It beats having to manually hole punch tons of pages (and saves time too)!
customer_reviews.author: Didi

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.text: Love this punch. I am disabled and have weakness in my hand so this makes it so easy to punch.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Ditzel

customer_reviews.title: Quick and relatively quiet
customer_reviews.text: We have three hole punches in our copy room and this one gets the most use. I wouldn't call it quiet, but it is quietest we have. The button does tend to stick down every once in a while. Not a big deal. Just push it again/away from the side it is stuck on and it comes up and turns off as it should. It holds a fair amount of paper at a time for it can make quick work of large projects.
customer_reviews.author: Nearly

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works so much better then manual hole punch. Wish we would of purchased sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Kayser

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: It works for what I need it. It's not the most durable. I have one at work just like it and it didn't last very long the first go round either. Guess you have to spend money to get something that will last.
customer_reviews.author: Tonie P

customer_reviews.title: Great 3 hole punch.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a teacher who got tired of the school 3 hole punch not working and bought this for my own classroom. It arrived super fast. I've used it all school year and it works great. It's easy to empty and is just hard enough to open that no one spills the dots. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: MmeClavie

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the hole punch arrived with smashed plastic so it went back two days later. I did hold it long enough to realize it would not be durable enough to live through daily use for too long. I have a very heavy duty manual hole punch that busts through 30 pages at a time, but thought I'd try electric when my manual one started to mis-fire on the center holes. I am now motivated to get my machine repaired!
customer_reviews.author: KE in Cal

customer_reviews.title: Great Heavy Duty 3-Hole Punch
customer_reviews.text: Awesome hole punch. Perfect for when you need to get through that huge stack of documents quickly to get ready for an audit.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Bergstrom

customer_reviews.title: WRONG broke after only 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I just posted this rating with 2 stars. Not sure how to take it back. My assistant was using the wrong power cord **face palm**
customer_reviews.author: JE YerGalVal

customer_reviews.title: Dead in months
customer_reviews.text: This looked great, worked well, but within a few months, it completely stopped working. Did all the customary things to ensure it wasn't a user problem. No luck. Essentially it was disappointing and short-lived item.
customer_reviews.author: Drtrueblue

customer_reviews.title: this is the best 3 hole punch I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Although this is "portable" it's a lot larger than i expected it to be. But no matter, this is the best 3 hole punch I've ever used! Hole punches things quickly and has a compartment for the leftover paper circles at the bottom of the hole punch with a sliding compartment for easy removal. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Puncher delivered with damaged interior parts
customer_reviews.text: The puncher arrived with damaged internal parts. Some interior parts is likely to have come loose or broke as I can hear the loose parts tumbling in the machine while unpacking. I was able to run it for 4 times, before smelling burnt rubber or plastic smell. The machine did not work after that.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: I print sooooo much this product saves so much time and its pretty durable yet small enough I can put it into ...
customer_reviews.text: made college student life so much easier....I print sooooo much this product saves so much time and its pretty durable yet small enough I can put it into my desk when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Shantell Mishler

customer_reviews.title: Used Item
customer_reviews.text: This product was used shipped to me with out a cord and was presented with paper inside as evidence of prior use.
customer_reviews.author: K. Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Works great if you punch a few sheets at a time
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Always try to punch a few sheets at a time because if you punch one at a time one of the punch holes might get stuck
customer_reviews.author: Denis A.

customer_reviews.title: Just what's needed.
customer_reviews.text: All features are as advertised. 50 sheets with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: R. Preston Price

customer_reviews.title: A perfect three hole punch
customer_reviews.text: I have so many pages to put three holes in that this was a lifesaver. It does a wonderful job
customer_reviews.author: downsizing1141

customer_reviews.title: Works but is loud
customer_reviews.text: Works good and doesnt jam up very easily. I was surprised at how noisy it is, butbthats probably why its so cheap. I will probably upgrade to a better unit that doesnt sound so abnoxious.
customer_reviews.author: NWMomma

customer_reviews.title: It’s a gem
customer_reviews.text: Great. Well worth the money. Now if it only lasts. Use it for many page reports.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: Works extremely well as long as you don't try to ...
customer_reviews.text: Works extremely well as long as you don't try to punch through too many sheets of paper at once. Only got bound up when I tried to punch through too many papers at once. Smaller piles go very fast. After using this, I will never punch holes manually. I wish there was a way to swing one hole out to be able to do a single punch, but there isn't.
customer_reviews.author: Book Worm

customer_reviews.title: It does the job.
customer_reviews.text: It works good but the plastic cover when cutting feels like is going to come out.
customer_reviews.author: Abel Feliciano

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I use this everyday to punch holes in my students work.
customer_reviews.author: Nitra

customer_reviews.title: Great holepuncher
customer_reviews.text: This hole punches all my documents to put in a binder just fine, still havent even gotten close to filling up the tray, also the electric button is a lifesaver and makes it work free to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Davon

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a hospital buyer. I am always amazed how quickly nurses can destroy something. They treat equipment like WWE wrestlers treat opponents. After buying three lower priced models for this dept so far this year, I decided to get a little more expensive model so maybe they couldn't destroy it the first week and it seems to be working out! They love it, they don't complain about jams, it takes on a lot of pages, so maybe this one is a winner. I'll let you know in a few months......
customer_reviews.author: Hosp Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Super so far. Good purchase, and Swingline has been around for decades, so I knew I could count on it.
customer_reviews.author: Brite1

customer_reviews.title: Very nice electric hole punch
customer_reviews.text: Why do I love an electric hole punch? Helps with hands that hurt when you have to bear down. It's bigger than a regular hole punch, but sure nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: TheVintageVegan

customer_reviews.title: can't hold too many papers!
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine if you are buying it for personal use. It doesn't hold too many papers and it is hard to line them up evenly each time. This is just sitting on my desk and in using the manual one.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: The slide is very hard to move
customer_reviews.text: We got this to replace the last one we had that broke. This one the slide that switches the hole punch is so hard to move. sometimes it doesnt even want to move. we have to forcefully slide it over and it usually takes a few tries. we thought maybe it just needed to 'break in' (none of the others we had did this) but its still extremely stiff and not sliding how it should. i dont have a return option... going to contact amazon support.
customer_reviews.author: BRD

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Plastic and flimsy broken in the box it came in!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Braum

customer_reviews.title: Great little office tool
customer_reviews.text: This 3-hole punch is small but it does they job. It's light easy to work with!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Pinard

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Light, easy to use, does not take a lit of space as most manual 3-hole punches do
customer_reviews.author: D L in Los Angeles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my home office!
customer_reviews.text: This little hole puncher just keeps going. I've had it for a few months now and no problems really. I keep putting in larger and larger stacks of papers and it keeps working fine. Nice affordable option to fancy work office models.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product & you won't hurt your hand punching holes :-)
customer_reviews.text: This works great! I like that I can actually insert up to 20 sheets of paper at one time and get holes punched in all of them. I use this quite regularly as I am in an online graduate nursing school and print a tremendous amount of notes and handouts that require hole punches to secure them in a notebook.
customer_reviews.author: KL Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for our office to replace a six year old one. They work wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for teachers and students.
customer_reviews.text: I am a teacher and a student this thing is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and dependable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for use in a classroom, and it is a lifesaver. Should have bought one several years ago. Never jams, easy to operate, and hike punches like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: Durable. Easy to use. Reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered hole punch because the one I’ve used for the last ten years stopped working. It’s working again. Now I have two. It’s easy to use. Somewhat noisy when punching holes, but durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First electric punch
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of trying to punch multiple pieces of paper at once, so got the electric one. First thing I did was to put in 19 sheets and I jammed it. It says ONLY 15 sheets. Well, it still works, just doesn't punch the bottom hole all the way through. But that was my fault. Otherwise, yes, I like it! Much easier than pushing the other one constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe G

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. It operates with ease and quietness. Many pages at the same time could put in. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: cinest

customer_reviews.title: I use this at work. I'm a teacher. ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this at work. I'm a teacher. It works well. I have put too many pages in it and it just stopped. No problem. There is a "back" button that allows you to pull the pages out. This is a "must have" for the classroom.
customer_reviews.author: DebraD

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have bought this product a long time ago. Works great and so much easier than the manual one. Easy to use, quiet and cleans up well.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Mac

customer_reviews.title: Easy-to-use and effective
customer_reviews.text: So far this electric 3-hole punch works really great for my purposes. It's a little louder upon punching than I expected, but it does the job. It punches 15 pages just wonderfully without trouble. It seems like it is a good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Buy this! Spend the money! I am a ...
customer_reviews.text: Buy this! Spend the money! I am a freak about notebooks for everything and muddled along with my "manual" three hole punch because I was too cheap to buy this one. If you are looking at this and questioning if it is worth it - BUY IT!
customer_reviews.author: Mizry D'Lot

customer_reviews.title: Defective---does not work
customer_reviews.text: The third whole is obstructed with thick metal piece from manufacturing plant. It seems the piece was not cut off correctly and missed the QC control. Anyways, only two holes get punched correctly the third is obstructed and does not allow the paper to align properly. Unfortunately, it's too late for me to return. I bought this item months ago and it sat new in my room for a long time. Now that I need it, I realize it is defective :(
customer_reviews.author: Diana L.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed! Just purchased this last year and already the third hole does not punch! What a waste of money. I'm back to using my manual hole puncher which is far more time consuming but never fails me!
customer_reviews.author: MsPhD2016

customer_reviews.title: Runs on batteries or wall outlet!
customer_reviews.text: This hole punch has the power to punch 15 sheets simultaneously, and it truly is portable since you can operate it with six AA batteries. It's great for college classes where the professor distributes handouts because you can immediately punch the holes in them and place them in your binder when class is over. Great organizational tool!
customer_reviews.author: Gordon L. Hasty

customer_reviews.title: School binder Organizing helper
customer_reviews.text: The charger wire slides out a bit so I have to keep checking it. I haven't used it with just the batteries as of yet. It does a perfect job in helping me get all my papers, including my school papers, ready to go in my binders.
customer_reviews.author: MomOf4

customer_reviews.title: Great Product & Great Service
customer_reviews.text: I'm an auditor so I have a lot of need to punch holes and create binders full of work documentation. Thus, we purchased this item for my team and it is one of the best purchases ever! We've been using it a year and no issues. This product was so good I just recently purchased one for my home use..... (yes nerdy, don't judge). Furthermore, I received a personalized note from the Seller which thanked me for my order and provided me with a contact # if by chance I was unhappy with the purchase for any reason. To me this is great personalized customer service! Strong recommendation to buy from this Seller.
customer_reviews.author: J. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Swingline Medium Duty Electric Paper Punch
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this reconditioned, because I didn't want to pay full price. This paper punch works fantastic! Saves me so much time! I use it to punch 28 lb paper, 50 and 72 page sets and works great!
customer_reviews.author: SunnyDayz

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Effective
customer_reviews.text: This hole punch is simple and easy to use on multiple pages. Also worked great on laminated pages.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice electric hole punch. My only hesitation is that it is on the louder side, compared to others I have seen. Otherwise- well worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Terranova

customer_reviews.title: Made for the super lazy and yet financially unable to afford an industrial ...
customer_reviews.text: Made for the super lazy and yet financially unable to afford an industrial version, this little unit does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Avid shopper

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We had this product for 10 days. We did not 3 hole punch alot, however is started jamming up. Then the piston in the middle got stuck. We have not been able to fix it since. I would not recommend buying this product. It was a total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Paradigm Lady

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use! - a great addition to the workroom .... and it doesn't have a huge handle sticking up in the way, so rather compact but a hardworker.
customer_reviews.author: Texas rancher

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, really makes punching holes easier for someone with arthritis and carpal tunnel syndrome. Great addition to my home office.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: very heavy use so glad it lasted us that long
customer_reviews.text: This was our second Swingline Electric 3 hole puncher. We had our other one for over 5 years, very heavy use so glad it lasted us that long!
customer_reviews.author: S Y.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. This works perfectly and saved me from a sore arm using a manual hole puncher. HIGHLY recommended!!!! 1/4/2015 additional comment ... this has literally been punching holes through several thousand sheets and still works well. I love this item.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey51

customer_reviews.title: Holes do not punch all the way through
customer_reviews.text: One of the holes (the middle hole) did not punch through all the way so I had to return it. Doesn’t matter how many pieces of paper I put in. Even if it’s just one piece of paper, the middle hole would not punch through all the way. Very disappointed as I was depending on this product for work because I have carpal tunnel.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: It works (most of the time). Won't punch through ...
customer_reviews.text: It works (most of the time). Won't punch through many sheets and sometimes won't work when pressing the button. Eventually works though.
customer_reviews.author: G. Kerber

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I hate using manual hole punches. this was a bit pricey but I couldn't take it anymore. so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Regina

customer_reviews.title: Guides are Terrible
customer_reviews.text: The guide doesn't work appropriately and you will never get the same punch twice. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this hole punch! It isn't as loud as some of the other brands!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney S.

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Four stars instead of five, because ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well.Four stars instead of five, because it's noisy, unlike the professional model by the same company (which is quite a bit more expensive). For the price, it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: TiaVie

customer_reviews.title: great price and very useful
customer_reviews.text: This is a very useful product, however batteries do not last long. I wish there was a rechargeable version, but it is good for the price
customer_reviews.author: moodygirl

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much best value for your money. use in the classroom and it has held up!
customer_reviews.author: Buyer3467

customer_reviews.title: Quality hole punch that is always on and working for you
customer_reviews.text: This punch is a little workhorse. Works well and this is the second one in 4 years - we wore out the first one.
customer_reviews.author: R. English

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t quite sure, but ended pleased
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase Strong hole punch Portable Very easy to use
customer_reviews.author: L. Gallen

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Simple and effective. It is a little loud but not more so than expected. In general I have been very happy with swingline products. Lastly, the vendor shipped the product safely and quickly to my home without issue.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sahr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Everyone in the building is always stopping by to use this.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Rhyne

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: saw it at one of my volunteer stations and bought one for myself, love it, use it all the time, works well even with batteries only
customer_reviews.author: dhwein

product_meta.title: Swingline Electric 3 Hole Punch, Desktop Hole Puncher 3 Ring, Home Office Supplies, Portable Desk Accessories, 15 Sheet Paper Capacity, Office Paper Punch, Silver and Black (74515)
product_meta.description:
Style:15 SheetSwingline Electric Portable Desktop Punch is an excellent option for compact, portable punching, with dual power options that allow you to take it on the go. Efficient paper alignment indicators provide professional results every time. An automatic jam reverse feature ensures trouble-free use. A push-button electric start puts neat, 3-hole-punching at your fingertips - a simple press of a button is all it takes for clean, precise punching. Punches neat, 9/32" holes through up to 15 sheets of paper. Dual power options add convenience — power it from the AC adapter or use 6 AA batteries for portability. Swingline backs this high-quality, silver and black punch with a limited 1-year warranty.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Swingline
feature_bullets: POWERED EFFICIENCY: Light, compact electric punch provides quick, precise punching. Automatic 3 hole punch with efficient paper alignment indicators ensures accurate punching every time
JAM RESISTANT: Automatic jam reverse switch ensures trouble free punching and fewer disruptions, even through the biggest punching projects
PUSH BUTTON START: Simple push button start makes hole punching effortless. Efficient electric punch allows you to preserve your strength while still presenting professional results
15 SHEET CAPACITY: Punches through as many as 15 sheets of paper, creating precise 9/32 Inches holes with the push of a button
AC OR BATTERY: Dual power options. This punch can be powered by an AC adapter or 6 AA batteries, providing both reliable punching power and lightweight mobility in one convenient package
LESS MESS: Chip tray minimizes mess and allows for easy cleanup of punched holes just empty it when you notice it’s getting full
BUILT TO LAST: Swingline stands behind this high quality automatic punch with a Limited 1 Year Warranty
